channel.title: Help with Port!
channel.description: hi im using 43594 but some servers request 5555 how i log in in those servers? what i need to change?

item.title: Help with Port!
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

the server that request 5555 means that they are a pk server, or the owner of the server just wanted to change the servers port to 5555.

To change the port, just go to moparscape client and at the top click file the you’ll see “new server” and “new port”.

Click on new port and a small screen will come out. Then just type 5555 and press “ok”.

Then you have to put the servers ip. Which you should know how to do that already.

Any problem then post it here.

Read full topic
